alert.note: Alert for Southern Nassau (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 2:13PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Nassau County through 315 PM EDT... At 213 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Atlantic Beach, or near Long Beach, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Freeport, Long Beach, Massapequa, Jones Beach, Oceanside, Wantagh, Lido Beach, Atlantic Beach, Merrick, East Massapequa, Bellmore, Seaford, North Wantagh, Baldwin Harbor and Lawrence. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
